caption.p: The effects of fennel and TA treatment on the (a) FBS, (b) water intake, (c) glucose excretion rate, (d) food intake, and (e) body weight changes of the STZ‐induced diabetic rats ( n = 6). *** p < .001 shows the significant differences with the control group. # p < .05, ## p < .01, ### p < .001 shows the significant differences with the STZ group. + p < .05, ++ p < .01 shows the significant differences with the STZ‐TA group
